text: The 2017–18 West Coast Conference men's basketball season began with practices on September 2017 and ended with the 2018 West Coast Conference Men's Basketball Tournament March 2018. This was the 67th season for WCC men's basketball, and the 29th under its current name of "West Coast Conference". The conference was founded in 1952 as the California Basketball Association, became the West Coast Athletic Conference in 1956, and dropped the word "Athletic" in 1989. == Head Coaches == === Coaching changes === === Coaches === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%;" |- ! width="110" | Team !
